title: Phil Interviews Illuminati Grandmaster Leo Zagami 2008-06-19 (2)
description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Phil Interviews Illuminati Grandmaster Leo Zagami - 2008-06-19 - The Last Interview in the US
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After notifying me of his deep concerns for the safety of his son, Leo called me up later that day. In this last interview that Leo gave before heading back to Europe, the following subjects are discussed:

-Leo raises to subject of the growing threat of the Knights of Columbus, an originally American Roman Catholic Military Order, who are gaining more power in Europe

-Fatma&#039;s involvement with two frauds with the Norwegian authorities
 <a href="
http://www.leozagami.com/index.php?option=com_fireboard&Itemid=57&func=view&id=525&catid=28#534" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.leozagami.com/index.php?option=com_fireboard&Itemid=57&func=view&id=525&catid=28#534</a>

-How blood-feuds trigger wars, the rest is window dressing

-How the Muslim world aims to take over the Vatican in a joint effort with the Jesuits and the Zionists

-The insane Sabbatean doctrine of sending the world to Hell in order to precipitate the Second Coming

-Repentance

-Leo feels sorry for Fatma; Leo feels the reason for Fatma leaving for Turkey may be to also get exorcized 

-The Second Coming and public awareness of it

-Leo&#039;s plan to be interviewed by the German National TV

-Leo&#039;s PR campaign, overseen by Erik Markham, and the starting of a myspace account devoted to Leo and his Cause

-The planned HBO TV series about the CIA and secret societies (in particular, The Council of 12) for which Leo seems to be the overseeing editor; Leo Zagami&#039;s Hollywood Propaganda Campaign with a twist

-Leo&#039;s grandmother Felicity Mason (Anne Cumming) taught Leo how to act
 <a href="
http://www.jamd.com/search?assettype=g&assetid=77349630&text=%2522felicity+mason%2522+OR+%2522anne+cumming%2522" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.jamd.com/search?assettype=g&assetid=77349630&text=%2522felicity+mason%2522+OR+%2522anne+cumming%2522</a> <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0556706/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0556706/</a>

-Leo&#039;s encounter with Bill and Kerry from Project Camelot in Februari and his sensing of the evil Jinns that accompanied them
 <a href="
http://www.projectcamelot.org/leo_zagami.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.projectcamelot.org/leo_zagami.html</a>

-The Voodoo spell imposed on Leo probably by Obama&#039;s friends from the Chicago Lodge 

-Mehmet Suslu; Zaman, the most popular newspaper in Turkey controlled by the Gulen Movement; Abdullah Aimas 

-How Agent JJP has given Leo new hope at he being able to see his son

-How the letter written by Monique to Fatma was divinely inspired and that it must have had an impact on Fatma

-On reflecting back Leo wished he would&#039;ve taken up on Ezio Giunchiglia&#039;s advice to take up residence in Livorno instead of Oslo

-Fatma&#039;s habit of smoking Hashish all day long in the beginning of her relationship with Leo, that seemingly went at the expense of her ability to run a company set up with help, including finance, from Leo&#039;s mother

-Fatma&#039;s abortions and Leo&#039;s pertinent stance against abortion
 <a href="
http://www.bodilfuru.com/BODIL/My%20Ambience.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bodilfuru.com/BODIL/My%20Ambience.html</a>

-Fatma&#039;s rather liberal previous sexually oriented habits

-The speciality of Leo&#039;s marriage with Fatma, to create a dialogue between Muslims, Christians and the Jews

-How Fethullah Gulen is not really content with the way the Suslu brother understand Islam

-The Sayids (descendents of the Prophet Mohammed) and the way they are behaving in theory and practice

-The issue of the destruction of the Al-Aksa Mosque

-How Solomon used Genies to construct the Temple of Solomon

-Fatma&#039;s responsibility towards her own actions and her son&#039;s safety

-The Sufis&#039; tradition of becoming practising magicians from a very early age, and the worrisome prospect of Leo&#039;s son following in that tradition soon

-Fatma&#039;s internal conflict due to her having to balance between two cultures, the conservative Muslim Sufi tradition and the liberal Norwegian western culture 

-Indian Tantra

-Melik Tau (spelling?) - a Powerful Genie and its relationship with some sex cult, Leo went to investigate

-TheForerunner777 and Leo&#039;s take on his latest video; TheForerunner777 is from Media Line Cinema, hmmm now what does that tell you? ;Leo&#039;s says he TFR has a distorted view of reality


----------------------------------------------
